story_15_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
You said you’re [Name:PlayerNickname ], right?
You sure are something.
story_15_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Seeing how strong you are, I’m guessing you’ve
had your fair share of run-ins with Team Break?
story_15_02000/2401_0401_0500_10:
You didn’t even hesitate to answer, did ya?
I appreciate that.
story_15_02000/2401_0402_0700_10: Sounds like I was on target.
story_15_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I may not be a zippy young Trainer like you
anymore, but I still train hard to get stronger.
story_15_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
What would you say to having somebody
like me on your team, kid?
story_15_02000/2401_0401_1100_10:
You might be a little too earnest for your
own good... But I appreciate it.
story_15_02000/2401_0402_1300_10:
Don’t worry. I might prefer Dark types,
but I’m a good guy.
story_15_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Guess that’s that, then.
What about you, Grimsley?
story_15_02000/2401_1001_1500_10: I think I’ll pass for now.
story_15_02000/2401_1001_1600_10:
There’s only room for one wild card in any
good deck.
story_15_02000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Well, guess it’ll just be me, then.
Looking forward to working with you kids.
